lab_metadata.title: AWS Search Services to Azure Cognitive Search: Intelligent Content Discovery and Management
lab_metadata.description: Master intelligent search and content management by migrating from AWS OpenSearch, CloudSearch, and Elasticsearch to Azure Cognitive Search with AI-powered insights
prerequisites: Understanding of search concepts and indexing
Knowledge of document processing and content extraction
Familiarity with RESTful APIs and JSON
Basic understanding of machine learning concepts
learning_objectives: Migrate AWS OpenSearch/Elasticsearch clusters to Azure Cognitive Search
Transform AWS CloudSearch domains to Azure Search services
Convert AWS Kendra enterprise search to Cognitive Search with AI enrichment
Implement intelligent document processing with Form Recognizer integration
Set up multilingual search with translation and language detection
Configure AI-powered content enrichment and skill pipelines
Establish search analytics and performance optimization

scenario.title: Enterprise Knowledge Management Platform Migration
scenario.description: DocuFlow Enterprises manages a comprehensive knowledge base with 10TB+ of documents in multiple languages, serving 50K+ employees globally. They need to migrate from AWS search services to Azure while adding AI-powered insights and improving search relevance.
business_requirements: Sub-200ms search response times for global users
Intelligent document processing and metadata extraction
Faceted search with smart filtering and suggestions
Integration with existing content management systems
Advanced analytics and search behavior insights
current_aws_architecture: OpenSearch cluster for document indexing and search
CloudSearch domains for structured data search
Comprehend for text analysis and entity extraction
S3 for document storage with Lambda processing
target_azure_architecture: Cognitive Search for unified intelligent search
Computer Vision for image content analysis
Blob Storage with Event Grid for content processing

lab_sections.title: Search Infrastructure Migration: OpenSearch to Azure Cognitive Search
lab_sections.description: Migrate core search infrastructure with enhanced AI capabilities

aws_context.description: Managed search and analytics engine based on Elasticsearch

azure_equivalent.description: AI-powered search service with built-in cognitive capabilities
key_features: Built-in text analytics and language processing
Integrated machine learning and custom skills

hands_on_exercises.title: Create Cognitive Search Service with AI Enrichment Pipeline

steps.description: Create Azure Cognitive Search service with appropriate tier
steps.aws_context: Similar to creating OpenSearch domain with instance types
steps.azure_command: az search service create --name docuflow-search --resource-group rg-search --sku Standard --replica-count 2 --partition-count 1 --location eastus
steps.explanation: Creates scalable search service with high availability configuration

steps.description: Set up data source connections and indexing
steps.aws_context: Equivalent to OpenSearch index creation and data ingestion

change_detection.policy: Track document modifications using lastModified timestamp

deletion_detection.policy: Mark deleted documents with isDeleted flag

steps.explanation: Establishes automated content ingestion with change tracking

steps.description: Create AI enrichment skillset for content processing
steps.aws_context: Similar to Comprehend and Textract integration in processing pipeline

skills.description: Detect document language for multilingual processing
Split large documents into manageable chunks
Extract text from images and scanned documents

steps.explanation: Creates comprehensive AI pipeline for intelligent content understanding

steps.description: Configure search index with enriched fields
steps.aws_context: Equivalent to OpenSearch index mapping with field types
steps.explanation: Defines rich search schema with AI-enriched metadata fields

validation: Verify Cognitive Search service is created and accessible
Confirm data source successfully connects to blob storage
Test AI skillset processes documents and extracts insights
Validate search index contains enriched content and metadata

lab_sections.title: Intelligent Document Processing: Kendra to Cognitive Search with Form Recognizer
lab_sections.description: Transform enterprise knowledge discovery with advanced document understanding

aws_context.description: Intelligent enterprise search service powered by machine learning

azure_equivalent.description: Combined intelligent search with advanced document understanding
key_features: Semantic search with natural language understanding
Custom skill integration for domain-specific processing

hands_on_exercises.title: Deploy Advanced Document Understanding Pipeline

steps.description: Set up Form Recognizer for structured document processing
steps.aws_context: Similar to Textract for form and document analysis

form_recognizer_setup.service_creation: az cognitiveservices account create --name docuflow-forms --resource-group rg-search --kind FormRecognizer --sku S0 --location eastus
prebuilt_models: Business card extraction for contact management
ID document processing for identity verification
General document analysis for any document type

custom_models.name: contract-analyzer
custom_models.purpose: Extract key terms from legal contracts

steps.description: Create custom cognitive skill for Form Recognizer integration
steps.aws_context: Equivalent to custom Kendra data source connector

skill_definition.name: FormRecognizerSkill
skill_definition.description: Extract structured data from documents using Form Recognizer

functionality: Call Form Recognizer API for analysis
Return enriched content to search pipeline

steps.explanation: Creates sophisticated document processing with structured data extraction

steps.description: Implement semantic search and natural language queries
steps.aws_context: Similar to Kendra natural language query understanding

query_examples.expected: Documents with contract-related content from Q4 2023
Technical documents related to cloud migration projects

semantic_search.answer_generation: Enable AI-powered answer extraction from search results

steps.explanation: Provides natural language search with intelligent answer generation

steps.description: Configure knowledge mining and insights dashboard
steps.aws_context: Equivalent to Kendra insights and analytics
steps.explanation: Enables data-driven content strategy and optimization

validation: Verify Form Recognizer processes different document types correctly
Test custom cognitive skill extracts structured data accurately
Confirm semantic search returns relevant results for natural language queries
Validate knowledge mining dashboard shows meaningful insights

lab_sections.title: Multilingual Search: Translation and Language Processing
lab_sections.description: Implement global search capabilities with translation and language support

hands_on_exercises.title: Configure Multilingual Search with Real-Time Translation

steps.description: Set up Azure Translator for multilingual content processing
steps.aws_context: Similar to AWS Translate integration in search pipeline

translator_setup.service_creation: az cognitiveservices account create --name docuflow-translator --resource-group rg-search --kind TextTranslation --sku S1 --location eastus

steps.explanation: Establishes comprehensive translation capabilities for global content

steps.description: Create translation cognitive skill for search pipeline

skill_definition.name: TranslationSkill
skill_definition.description: Translate content to multiple languages for global search

translation_skill.processing_logic: Translate content when source language differs from target

steps.explanation: Enables automatic content translation for multilingual search accessibility

steps.description: Implement query translation and cross-language search

preprocessing: Execute parallel searches in multiple languages
Merge and rank results by relevance
result_processing: Highlight matched terms in original language
Provide translation previews for foreign content
Score results considering language match and content relevance

user_experience.language_selector: Allow users to specify preferred result language
user_experience.bilingual_display: Show original and translated content side-by-side

validation: Verify translation service processes content in multiple languages
Test query translation returns relevant cross-language results
Confirm translated content maintains meaning and context
Validate search interface supports multilingual user experience

lab_sections.title: Advanced Search Features and Analytics
lab_sections.description: Implement sophisticated search capabilities and performance monitoring

hands_on_exercises.title: Configure Advanced Search Features and Monitoring

steps.description: Set up faceted search and intelligent filtering

smart_filtering.date_ranges: Intelligent date range suggestions based on content
smart_filtering.related_topics: Show related entities and key phrases
smart_filtering.similar_documents: Vector similarity search for related content

steps.explanation: Enables sophisticated content discovery through multiple dimensions

intelligent_suggestions: Personalized suggestions based on user behavior
Contextual suggestions from current search session

steps.explanation: Improves search experience with intelligent query assistance

steps.description: Configure search analytics and performance monitoring

analytics_setup.application_insights: az monitor app-insights component create --app docuflow-search-insights --resource-group rg-search --location eastus
custom_metrics: Zero-result queries for content gap analysis

steps.explanation: Provides comprehensive search platform insights and optimization data

validation: Test faceted search provides meaningful content filtering
Verify auto-complete suggestions improve search efficiency
Confirm analytics capture relevant search behavior metrics
Validate performance monitoring detects issues proactively

cost_optimization.aws_comparison: OpenSearch charges for instance hours and storage
cost_optimization.azure_model: Cognitive Search charges per search unit and storage
optimization_strategies: Right-size search units based on query volume patterns
Use Standard tier for production with Basic for development
Optimize index size through field selection and analyzers
Implement query caching and result optimization

cost_optimization.aws_comparison: Separate charges for Comprehend, Textract, and Translate
cost_optimization.azure_model: Integrated cognitive services with volume discounts
optimization_strategies: Batch process documents to reduce API calls
Use built-in skills instead of custom processing where possible
Implement smart caching for AI enrichment results
Optimize skill pipelines to avoid redundant processing

practices: Implement Azure AD authentication for search service access
Use API keys with appropriate permissions and rotation
Enable search service firewall for network access control
Implement row-level security for sensitive document filtering
Encrypt search indexes and data sources at rest
Use customer-managed keys for sensitive content
Implement data masking for personally identifiable information
Regular security audits of search content and access patterns
Implement content classification and sensitivity labeling
Use Azure Purview for data governance and lineage
Set up automated content lifecycle management
Monitor and audit search query patterns for compliance

tasks: Audit existing OpenSearch/CloudSearch configurations and data
Document current search schemas, mappings, and custom logic
Assess content volume, languages, and document types
Evaluate integration points with applications and workflows
Plan content migration strategy and timeline
Create Cognitive Search service with appropriate scaling
Set up cognitive services for AI processing (Form Recognizer, Translator)
Configure data sources and connection to content repositories
Create AI enrichment skillsets and custom skills
Establish monitoring and analytics infrastructure
Migrate content to Azure Blob Storage
Configure and test AI enrichment pipelines
Create search indexes with enriched schema
Run initial indexing and validate content processing
Test search functionality and query performance
Update applications to use Cognitive Search APIs
Implement advanced search features (facets, suggestions, semantic search)
Configure multilingual search and translation capabilities
Set up search analytics and performance monitoring
Optimize search relevance and user experience

symptoms: Irrelevant results appearing in top positions
Expected documents not found in search results
solutions: Review and adjust search field weights and boosting
Implement custom scoring profiles for relevance tuning
Analyze search analytics to identify content gaps
Use semantic search for better natural language understanding
Optimize analyzers and tokenizers for content type

symptoms: Documents not being processed by cognitive skills
solutions: Check cognitive services API limits and quotas
Verify skillset configuration and input/output mappings
Monitor custom skill endpoints for availability and performance
Review document formats and content for compatibility
Implement error handling and retry logic in custom skills

symptoms: Poor quality translations affecting search results
Cross-language queries not returning expected results
solutions: Verify language detection accuracy and confidence scores
Use custom translation models for domain-specific content
Implement language-specific analyzers and search configurations
Test query translation accuracy and adjust logic
Monitor translation quality and user feedback

links: Elasticsearch to Cognitive Search migration guide

next_steps: Implement Azure OpenAI integration for generative search capabilities
Set up vector search for semantic similarity and recommendations
Configure Azure Purview for comprehensive data governance
Explore Azure Synapse Analytics for advanced search analytics
Implement chatbot integration with Cognitive Search knowledge base
Set up automated content quality scoring and improvement workflows
